Articles.Content:
I keep 2 save files,

Campaign

and

Just goofin' around.

Lately I haven't even loaded campaign, making me think about simply starting a new campaign... but I'm not sure if I should wait for .22

This is looking gorgeous!

I'm relieved you're having the docking port as a separate model, because I plan to use this as a post-Apollo craft myself, with a real androgynous berthing mechanism...

So I haven't forgotten about this or abandoned it - I decided to remake the UVs and textures and it provided me with a whole lot to do and not much to show for it. At least I found out there's a right and really wrong way to set up UVs for use with normals. Anyway, it looks a whole lot like the Orion, doesn't it?

Retextured to look pretty much the same as before.
this would fit really well with sumghai's service module, with possibly the replacement of the ICBM -parachute port with parachutes held below in a fairing.

this would fit really well with sumghai's service module

It does indeed.

This is just...Amazing! The way you incorperate the KSP style with Apollo!

This is art!
I can always a new good capsule, particularly one that meshes well with the stock parts (as I think this one will). It won't be too out of place on K&W either I think.
Man, this is beautiful! Awesome work. I must add it to my game and Beagle Flight. Do you mind if I use it in my on going adventures?
I'm really liking the look of that, I think the two windows on either side of the hatch might look a bit better if they have grey borders that look like the other side windows.
what about like, RCS? like the apollo and orion capsules have RCS thrusters on them.. which might be interesting...
Sapphire, Where did you go to pick this up? I just grabbed the full release of Sumghai's SHDI and want to use it with THIS pod (because this one is badass).
You can grab it off Dropbox on page 4.

I found it, immediately saw things I didn't like, and proceeded to edit some .cfgs. the end result:

my particular version (because of how small I noticed it was) has reduced torque and a crew of only 2.
Fellow Captain, could you give me a link to your modded capsule?
Mmmph that looks great. I think the textures look a little too pixel-y though. It'd be great if you could re-size the texture a bit.
I think hes on low settings...

Suddenly a pertinent thought occurred to me.


	MODULE
	{
		name = ModuleReactionWheel

		PitchTorque = 15
		YawTorque = 15
		RollTorque = 15

		RESOURCE
		{
			name = ElectricCharge
			rate = 1.2
		}
	}

Original Apollo had RCS, right, but no reaction wheels? Well, if one wants to go full Apollo workalike, ModuleReactionWheel does not have to use ElectricCharge. It can be monopropellant.

Suddenly a pertinent thought occurred to me.


	MODULE
	{
		name = ModuleReactionWheel

		PitchTorque = 15
		YawTorque = 15
		RollTorque = 15

		RESOURCE
		{
			name = ElectricCharge
			rate = 1.2
		}
	}

Original Apollo had RCS, right, but no reaction wheels? Well, if one wants to go full Apollo workalike, ModuleReactionWheel does not have to use ElectricCharge. It can be monopropellant.

You just blew my mind.

You are an inspiration! I just started learning to make 3d models a few weeks ago. I hope that I can make ships as detailed as your Apollo clone someday. I also love how well it jives with the rest of the KSP aesthetic. Great job!

Nice bit of reasoning there, Mihara! I think your discovery could well be a game changer.

On an unrelated note, I couldn't resist fitting this capsule out in full-on Apollo CSM style and take her for a spin.
I only wish there was a top that didn't have a docking probe on it, this is awsome in every other way though.

I only wish there was a top that didn't have a docking probe on it, this is awsome in every other way though.

And here I thought its fidelity to the original was the awesome part.

And here I thought its fidelity to the original was the awesome part.

The Telemachus plugin comes with that four-dish antenna, by the way.

yes, but, Its not that I don't like the drogue, its that I don't like it being attached to the top, in the sense that I can't change it out for a different docking port, but its a minor complain[t].

Edited November 8, 2013 by betaking

yes, but, Its not that I don't like the drogue, its that I don't like it being attached to the top, in the sense that I can't change it out for a different docking port, but its a minor complain.

You can't? Oh, yes you can.

And thanks, Mihara, I forgot all about Telemachus! It makes a nice finishing touch.

Edited October 27, 2013 by Jack Wolfe
